resourceGroup.description:: Name of an existing resource group to run the build in. This is the sandbox resource group.

subscription.description:: Subscription ID (GUID) of the subscription to use. If not set, the builder will use the default subscription of the authenticated user or service principal.

virtualNetwork.description:: Name of a pre-existing virtual network for the VM. This is the sandbox vnet.

virtualNetworkResourceGroup.description:: Name of the resource group that contains the virtual network provided in virtualNetwork.

defaultSubnet.description:: Name of a pre-existing subnet in the virtual network provided in virtualNetwork.

builderSubnet.description:: Name of a pre-existing subnet in the virtual network provided in virtualNetwork.

keyVault.description:: Name of an existing key vault to use for uploading certificates to the instance to connect. Must be in the same resource group as resourceGroup.

storageAccount.description:: Name of an existing storage account to use for uploading files to the instance to connect. Must be in the same resource group as resourceGroup.

identityId.description:: Resource ID of an existing user assigned identity to use for the sandbox.

name.description: Name of the Azure Compute Gallery to publish to

resourceGroup.description:: Name of the resource group that contains the gallery

subscription.description:: Subscription ID (GUID) of the subscription that contains the gallery. If not set, the builder will use the default subscription of the authenticated user or service principal.
